sourcesContent:
Get players ranked by their win loss ratios

{{player.gameName}} | {{player.firstName}} {{player.lastName}} | {{player.player_score}}

import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { BestWinLoss } from '../types'; import { LeaderboardService } from '../leaderboard.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-q7', templateUrl: './q7.component.html', styleUrls: ['./q7.component.css'] }) export class Q7Component implements OnInit { BestWinLosses: BestWinLoss[] = []; constructor( private leaderboardService: LeaderboardService, ) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.leaderboardService.getWinLoss() .subscribe(BestWinLosses => this.BestWinLosses = BestWinLosses); } }
